data.title: The Long Riders
data.meta_description: Band/Artist: The Long Riders, Luton, Beds, Tel: 07802 500304, Genre: Rock / Pop, Current Gigs: 12
data.text:
The Long Riders [Rock / Pop, 5 piece]

Your new favourite band! A awesome 5 piece Rock/60s/Rock & Roll/Tex-mex covers band based in Bedfordshire! Gaining quite the following locally, The Long Riders play something for everybody specialising in 60s and Rock n Roll. This 5 piece not only have a abundance of raw talent, but years of experience both individually and collectively and together they make a uniquely talented group. With the instrumentation available they can cover a wider variety of songs and bring something different to the table whether it be hair on the back of your neck guitar moments or gloriously fast ivory tinkling. Featuring living legend John Partridge on lead vocals & bass (Brian Poole and the Tremeloes, The Wellington Bootles) Local icon Barry Ingles on backing vocals & guitar (Los Corz, Supported Paul Young) the fabulous John Gittins on lead guitar The gifted Duncan Oatham on backing vocals & keyboards (Wooden Casino, Atlas) and finally the Deity that is Sam Farrell on drums (The Highwires, Little Chino) this band truly rock in all senses of the word! The Long Riders play music by artists such as The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, Chuck Berry, Elvis Presley, The Eagles, Fleetwood Mac, Dire Straits, Queen, T.Rex, Status Quo, Pink Floyd, Jerry Lee Lewis, The Contours, Jeff Beck and many, many others. Not only are they great live performers and know how to get the party rocking, but they also have the ability to play slow numbers with passion, care and heart for a slow dance with a loved one. Your new favourite band! A awesome 5 piece Rock/60s/Rock & Roll/Texmex covers band based in Bedfordshire
